direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods are related to channel binding operations but perform different actions (request vs. response).
Both methods handle channel binding operations and manage error responses similarly.
Both methods create responses with similar structures involving attributes and transaction IDs.

enhanced_by.reason: The request method initializes the state required for the response method.
The error response method can be invoked to handle exceptions similarly to the success response.
The binding response method can be used to verify the output structure of the channel bind response.
